item.title: Privilege Escalation Tool Based on MITE ATT&CK
item.description: Bachelor’s degree thesis titled ‘Análisis de procedimientos de escalada de privilegios basado en el framework MITRE ATT&CK’ for the Computer Engineering degree from the Universidad de Alcalá.

item.title: Wallapop crawler
item.description:
Crawler created using the Selenium python library. Functionalities have been implemented for:

  • Each visited ad is sent the URL of the product to your own Telegram group.
  • Crawled ads are saved in a csv.
  • Products are displayed on the terminal.
  • Products saved to a database with their respective fields.
